text: The Golden Age of Comic Books was the start of modern comics and the creation of known superheroes like Superman, Batman, Robin, Captain Marvel, Captain America, and Wonder Woman. The Golden Age started with the first appearance of Superman in Action Comics #1 (1938) and ended before the first appearance of Barry Allen / Flash in Showcase #4 (1956). == References == Category:1938 establishments in the United States Category:1930s in the United States Category:1940s in the United States Category:1950s in the United States
title: Golden Age of Comic Books
